quotes.quote: Our diversity is our strength. What a dull and pointless life it would be if everyone was the same.
Quality without results is pointless. Results without quality is boring.
In social matters, pointless conventions are not merely the bee sting of etiquette, but the snake bite of moral order.
It's pointless to have a nice clean desk, because it means you're not doing anything.
In sum, thought and reflection have been rendered thoroughly pointless by the circumstances in which modern men and women live and act.
Weekends don’t count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless.
The Internet is so big, so powerful and pointless that for some people it is a complete substitute for life.
Do something with what you learn.... Reading, listening and learning is pointless without doing, applying, sharing or implementing.
It is pointless to believe what you see, if you only see what you believe.
Don't pointless things have a place, too, in this far-from-perfect world?
There came a time when you realized that moving on was pointless. That you took yourself with you wherever you went.
If you have no intention of loving or being loved, the whole journey is pointless.
It's the pointless things that give your life meaning. Friendship, compassion, art, love. All of them pointless. But they're what keeps life from being meaningless.
Telling someone something he does not understand is pointless, even if you add that he will not be able to understand it.
The more the universe seems comprehensible, the more it also seems pointless.

Life and love are life and love, a bunch of violets is a bunch of violets, and to drag in the idea of a point is to ruin everything. Live and let live, love and let love, flower and fade, and follow the natural curve, which flows on, pointless.
All pursuits are pointless and fruitless unless and until love and compassion are found and then are the foundation and destination of all you do
Change without learning is painful. Learning without change is pointless.
Small moments we find so pointless can become cherished memories with time and the perspective that wisdom brings.
If we are incapable of finding peace in ourselves, it is pointless to search elsewhere.
Those pointless equations, to which no solution exists, are called absurdities.
We cannot bear a pointless torment, but we can endure great pain if we believe that it's purposeful.
It is equally pointless to weep because we won't be alive a hundred years from now as that we were not here a hundred years ago.
How pointless life could be, what a foolish business of inventing things to love, just so you could dread losing them.
A personality for the incredibly beautiful can be a pointless cargo…
It's pointless to be critical of your stuff once it's done. I don't spend a lot of time agonising over it. It's of no importance once it's finished.
To make a point, is to be blunt, which is pointless.

Please remember, no matter what you go through in life, somebody else might have it harder. So just appreciate. I feel like in our world today, we focus on so many things that are completely pointless.
The inability of some critics to connect the dots doesn't make pointillism pointless.
Kinda pointless to fight for what you want when what you want continues to break your heart.
